titles.title: Social Security Fairness for Merchant Mariners Act of 2004
To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide certain benefits under that Act to individuals who served in the United States Merchant Marine during World War II.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 7/22/2004--Introduced. Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to extend certain veterans benefits to individuals who served in the United States Merchant Marine during World War II.
